words.def: impart knowledge of some fact, state or affairs, or event to
a young person of either sex
the members of a business organization that owns or operates one or more establishments
the phonological or orthographic sound or appearance of a word that can be used to describe or identify something
The driest and palest type of traditional sherry.
a message received and understood
To thrust with a sword; to stab at.

A type of old snow which has gone through multiple thaw and refreeze cycles and thus is made of numerous small icy grains, though it is not nearly as saturated with water as snow-cone slush is; can be hard or somewhat soft depending on recent and current weather conditions.
the time period between dawn and noon
a standard or model or pattern regarded as typical
A small decorative box, hung from the sash of a kimono, for holding small objects.
A type of seaweed, laver, chopped and formed into sheets, used in the preparation of sushi.
A production in the style of film noir .
a heavy ductile magnetic metallic element
An afro hairstyle.
the cardinal number that is the sum of four and one
A fool or idiot.
nonresinous wood of a fir tree
County/City (Proper noun)
A member of the Romani people.
the shape of a raised edge of a more or less circular object
game in which matchsticks are arranged in rows and players alternately remove one or more of them
the second day of the week
A Russian village community.
Nomination.
A binary operator composite of NOT OR; negation of OR function.
a particle that is electrically charged (positive or negative)
An uncertainty, possibility, condition, doubt etc.
destruction of heart tissue resulting from obstruction of the blood supply to the heart muscle
moment.
A working-class punk rock  subgenre of the 1970s, sometimes associated with racism.
a negative
in operation or operational
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
